content.rendered:
Currently, the full content of Curious Caterer: Dying for Chocolate has not been filled, but we are trying to fill the gap, in the meantime, check out the trailers, pictures and actors of the movie.

Directed By Anthony C. Metchie

Written By Diane Mott Davidson, Erinne Dobson, John Christian Plummer

Stars: Nikki Deloach. Andrew W. Walker. Jaycie Dotin
